snippet.title: K/DA - THE BADDEST ft. (G)I-DLE, Bea Miller, Wolftyla (Official Lyric Video) | League of Legends
snippet.description:
Follow @KDA_MUSIC on Twitter and Instagram for daily updates.

Call it a flex. Witness K/DA’s comeback with their pre-release single, “THE BADDEST,” featuring the vocal talents of SOYEON and MIYEON of (G)I-DLE, Bea Miller, and Wolftyla.

K/DA is a virtual music supergroup by Ahri, Evelynn, Akali, and Kai’Sa. Following their explosive “POP/STARS” debut, K/DA returns this year with a long-awaited EP—coming soon.

MEET THE BAND:
https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en-us/event/kda-official-fan-club/

LISTEN NOW: 

https://ffm.to/kda-thebaddest
Spotify: https://ffm.to/kdathebaddest-spotify
Apple Music: https://ffm.to/kdathebaddest-applemusic
YouTube Music: https://ffm.to/kdathebaddest-youtubemusic
Deezer: https://ffm.to/kdathebaddest-deezer
Amazon Music: https://ffm.to/kdathebaddest-amazonmusic

PRODUCTION CREDITS:

K/DA - "THE BADDEST"
Featured artists: (G)I-DLE, Bea Miller, and Wolftyla 
Written by: Riot Music Team and Bekuh BOOM
Korean translation by: Lydia Paek and Minji Kim  
Produced by: Riot Music Team and Yasuo
Executive Produced by: Akali 
Mixed by: Riot Music Team 
Mastered by: Riot Music Team
Vocals performed by: SOYEON of (G)I-DLE, MIYEON of (G)I-DLE, Bea Miller, and Wolftyla
Additional vocals by: Bekuh BOOM
Vocal production by: Riot Music Team
Additional Vocal Production by: Oscar Free

https://www.instagram.com/official_g_i_dle
https://www.instagram.com/beamiller
https://www.instagram.com/wolftyla

ANIMATION: 

Jordan Taylor Studios and Riot Games 
https://www.everythingtaylor.com

LYRICS:

Baddest do what the baddest do
The baddest do we the baddest ooh
Baddest do what the baddest do
The baddest do we the baddest

Coming at you live
Real real wild
Here to light it up
Set the world on fire
Gonna break rules
And hearts in twos
Cause that's what the baddest do

Never going back
Nah not that
Diamonds on drip
Cause I came to make a splash
Gonna break rules
And hearts in twos
Cause that's what the baddest do

I spit heat, I melt your face off
Disappear, I'm your eraser
In the cut just like a razor
Murder business, where my blazer?
I got all the boys on me
I got all the lines on ring
Knock 'em dead, turnin heads
I got all the eyes on me
Pretty face 걸어들어와
유행 선두자
원하지만 못하잖아
애가 타잖아
You like “whoa” KALI you the goat
난 알지 I know
준비해 cause I like to ball
멈추지 않아
나는 lit 크게 like a bit
그거 말고 byte
믿어봐 큰 만큼 크게
어깨 펴고 high
백 퍼센트
덤비지 못해
죽여주잖아
나는 boss 간지 with the sauce
원하면 줄게

I’m doing damage
Went just how I planned it
I do what I want when I say
모두 날 따라 해
난 끝내주잖아
(Like) to live on the edge of insane

(It's crazy)
Sorry for the bad news sorry I’m so bad
Only took a minute for me to get what you had
Sorry for the bad news know it makes you sad
I’ll be here for a minute baby you should pack your bags

Way that I look should be breaking the law
If I don’t got it I take what I want
My circle small like a round of applause
You know that I love the sound of applause
You know I mean everything that I say
When you see me coming get out of the way
I came to slay I came to slay
back and I’m better and ready to stay

(It's crazy)
Sorry not sorry for being the best
언제든지 내가 좀 해
Look at the gold all on my chest
Look at the gold call it a flex
